entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Fundy (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:16 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow at times heavy beginning late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this morning then northeast 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
